PROJECT NAME: BULL DURHAM Full Flavor King Size Cigarettes
PROJECT LEADER: J. F. Anders/ J. E. Mann
PROJECT OBJECTIVE: Develop 14- mg "tar" delivery king size cigarette, for generic pricing directed toward young male, smokers. Cigarette dimensions- 85 mm x 24.9 mm, circumference- 20 mm filter- 24 mm tipping., Offshore tobacco blend with unique flavor formulation., Cork tipping.
